Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Implement Phase 2 intent-splitting and routing layer

- Add splitter_prompt.txt: LLM prompt that decomposes raw input into
  typed intents \(Task, Project, Idea\) in a single call

  date injected for relative date resolution; migrate route_input\(\)
  to use the google-genai SDK client instead of raw requests
- main.py: replace Phase 1 single-intent triage with Phase 2 loop —
  split_intents → per-type validation → write_to_notion; add 22 unit
  tests covering all validators and triage routing logic
- notion.py: extend build_properties to handle Project and Idea types;
  add DB-not-configured guard in write_to_notion; fix Idea.Category to
  multi_select and remove non-existent Raw Input / Source columns

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
